article: Look at the picture.It's a picture of  _  room. The walls  are white and the windows are big.On one of the walls you can see  _  old photo of her family.Her  _  is American.She is a teacher  _  English.She is  _  a white hat.Behind her mother  _  her father.He  _  young.The boy in the red coat is her brother Bob.Bob is ten years old.He is tall and  _  a round face.He has big eyes and a big nose.His mouth is wide,but his ears are small.He looks very cool.Lily is sitting  _  the floor .They look like their father and mother.
